charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came to town with
Katherine to go shopping.
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_0200_:
Hey [Name:PlayerNickname ], do you smell
something nice coming from somewhere?
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_0401_0500_:
Yes, the sweet smell of Bounsweet... Probably a
perfume from Alola.
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_0402_0700_:
Yes, it’s Salazzle’s pheromones... Probably a
perfume from Alola.
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_0900_:
Say, [Name:PlayerNickname ], would you like
to have a fragrance of your own?
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_1000_:
Just like how Valerie always smells lovely...you
need a nice fragrance to go with nice clothes.
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_1100_:
Your scent is a part of your appearance! A
pleasant aroma enhances the beauty of your
clothes so much more!
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_0402_1500_:
Don’t worry! I have a special method for situations
like this!
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_1700_:
Slurpuff has such a sharp sense of smell that she
can notice even the slightest difference in aromas.
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_1800_:
When I’m choosing a good perfume, I alway ask
for her help.
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_1900_:
Now, let’s go and find a fragrance perfect for
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1101_2000_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] tried out the fragrance
that Slurpuff helped [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] choose...
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_2100_:
All right. By now, that perfume should have
adapted to your skin, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_2200_:
A fragrance’s scent changes after putting it on
your skin and leaving it there for a while.
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_2300_:
What a stylish scent! You’re even more wonderful
than before!
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_2400_:
To draw people’s attention through their
eyes and nose...
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_2500_: That’s the goal behind my fashion design!
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_2600_:
Thank you as usual, Slurpuff! I’ll always count
on you!
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_0302_2900_: What a nice relationship you have!
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_0402_3000_:
Coming from you, that gives me even more
confidence!
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_3100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you must be tired
from walking so much today!
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_3200_:
I want to give Slurpuff a break as well. Should
we go to a café nearby?
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_3300_:
There’s still so much I want to discuss about
clothes in Laverre as well!
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_3400_:
Tea, snacks... Scents are all around us, even in
a café...
charaepi_ch0658_00_karen/2301_1201_3500_: I wonder what scents we can find next!
